seo.title: Search Ethiopian Passports - Live Updates
seo.description: Search Ethiopian passports from all ICS offices. Track urgent and regular applications with real-time updates. Get instant status information.

search.title: Check Ethiopian Passport Status

form.minCharacters: Type at least 3 characters to search

seo.title: ICS Branch Offices Directory - Ethiopian Passport Locations
seo.description: Directory of ICS branch offices across Ethiopia. Find your nearest location and check passport releases for urgent and regular applications.

locations.title: Official Immigration and Citizenship Services (ICS) branch offices
locations.subtitle: Pick a branch office to see the most recent passports released in that location.

byLocation.seoDescription: Check real-time passport releases at {{location}} ICS branch office. Track your urgent and regular Ethiopian passport application status for this location.
